text:
Hello - unfortunately we have a hard limit of 50mb for a projects build.

Some things that may be causing your build to exceed that limit

• Dependencies listed in package.json
    ◦ make sure cms-dev-server is a devDep and not an actual dep
• Large images / icon sets
If you DM me your portalID I can take a look at the project build as well.
Thanks for the reply, <@UCY83QS6Q>! Looking into this some more today or tomorrow!
